channel.title: New at The Book of Secret Knowledge

item.title: add 'BGPview'
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: BGPview - search for any ASN, IP, Prefix or Resource name.

item.description: :small_orange_diamond: PortSwigger Web Security Blog - about web app security vulns and top tips from our team of web security.
